H0.text: In medicine, epiphora affects which part of the human body. Nose

H1.text: In medicine, epiphora affects which part of the human body. Brain

H2.text: In medicine, epiphora affects which part of the human body. Skin

H3.text: In medicine, epiphora affects which part of the human body. Eye

A4.text: Epiphora is an overflow of tears onto the face

A5.text: The lacrimal sac is connected to the nasal mucosa

A6.text: The nasolacrimal duct empties into the nasal cavity

A7.text: Any excess fluid that did not go into the punctum will fall over the eyelid
